mn12:2.2: evaṃ → etaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr) | parisati → parisatiṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn12:44.2: pavivitto sudaṃ → pavivittassudaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | lūkho sudaṃ → lūkhassudaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn12:50.7: sosinno → sosīno (bj, cck, sya1ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr); so sino (sya2ed); sosindo (saddanīti)
mn12:57.3: Na kho pana so → na kho paneso (bj, sya-all)
mn12:63.1: Yaṃ kho taṃ → yaṃ kho panetaṃ (bj)
